text:
I have to handle the missions too, right?
Even though I'm an Oni, I should try to help Mano and Hiori...
It might be a little... difficult...
...Are we ready to start filming soon?
Ah, I'm sorry. Just a little more...

So I'm supposed to be... Mano and Hiori's... enemy,
huh... Hmm...

I'm sorry for the delay!
I'm ready now, please start filming!

Yeah!
I'll just give it my best shot for now!

Sometimes, instead of thinking,
it's better to just run and see where it takes you.

I'm sorry for causing any trouble!
I'll be watching over them from the monitor...
Oh, but if my heart starts racing again...
Ah, just come back for a bit.
